- The cross component stops the cups from spreading and maintains the contoured form.
- The cross component provides support and upward lift.
- No wires or resin parts at the bottom of the cup.

- Used a curve belt at the waist, so that they fit around the hips, and are designed to prevent them from sliding down after a while.
- Conducted study after study to achieve a special processing technology for a black color that does not gather dust.

- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Made with lightweight, double layered wool-polyester fabric.
- Perfect for layering or wearing as a suit.
items.name: WOMEN Wool Blend Jacket
items.shortDescription: Combines a smart look with a lightweight feel. A versatile jacket for any style.

items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

items.longDescription:
- Ultra-light, ultra-warm. Our sleek, no-bulk parka.
- Durable water-repellent coating.
- Pocketable design in a compact size for easy carrying.
- Anti-static lining.
- Versatile matte finish.
- Hood stoppers are now inside for a more stylish look.
- Pocketable design can be stored in the carrying pouch.
- Carrying pouch attaches to inside loop on the left.
items.name: WOMEN Ultra Light Down Parka
items.shortDescription: Newly updated with wider quilting for a more casual, puffy look.

items.composition: Shell: 100% Polyester [Filling] Body: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Sleeve: 70% Polyester, 30% Viscose/ Hood: 100% Polyester/ Lining: 100% Polyester
items.longDescription:
- Our first collaboration with White Mountaineering explores new possibilities in outerwear and fleece.

- Relaxed cut matches the collaboration’s concept of “the outdoors in everyday life”.
- Features UNIQLO's unique hybrid design.
- The hem adjusts with a spindle cord to create a cocoon silhouette.
- Shape-memory fabric with a subtle glossy sheen.
- Distinctive elegant look and soft feel.
- The same design is also available for kids to easily coordinate outfits with the whole family.
items.name: WOMEN WM Hybrid Down Oversized Parka
items.shortDescription: The cut, design, and textures used to create the concept combine superb function and style. *Purchase Limit : 2 pieces per item per person

items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Made with double layered wool and polyester fabric, combining lightness and warmth.
- Rounded, oversized cut.
- An easy throw-on outer layer.
- Elegant design with minimal detailing.

items.shortDescription: An easy throw-on layer with a roomy, rounded cut. Designed for a minimalist style.
